page.title: 04KIRKHOLT - A SURVEY
page.content: Kirkholt is one of Rochdale's largest estates, covering 300 acres, containing 1,378 houses, 166 bungalows, 738 flats and housing some 6,500 families. There are 29 estate shops and 326 garages. In the last ten years there has been a large increase in the number of elderly folk, and a reduction in the number of children aged under nine. At the present nearly thirty percent of Kirkholt residents are aged 10 to 24. A recent report shows the decline of non-manual workers on the estate over the last ten years compared with the rest of Rochdale.
